meanings.definition: The state of being afraid or anxious.
meanings.sent1: Her fearfulness was evident in her trembling hands.
meanings.sent2: His fearfulness prevented him from exploring new places.
meanings.sent3: The kitten's fearfulness of the vacuum cleaner was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The fearfulness in her eyes mirrored the storm raging within her.
meanings.sent5: The fearfulness in the dark alley made her heart race with terror.

meanings.definition: The quality of being timid or easily frightened.
meanings.sent1: The puppy's fearfulness made it cower in the corner.
meanings.sent2: His fearfulness was evident when he jumped at every sound.
meanings.sent3: The fearfulness of the squirrel made it scurry up the tree in a panic.
meanings.sent4: The fearfulness in her voice was like a soft whisper of vulnerability.
meanings.sent5: The fearfulness in his demeanor was like a fragile glass ready to shatter.
